src:
Penutupan Jogja Fashion Carnival 2019
03 Nov 2019, 17:58 by Dyan Parwanto



Penutupan Jogja Fashion Carnival 2019



Penutupan Jogja Fashion Carnival 2019



Penutupan Jogja Fashion Carnival 2019


KBRN, Yogyakarta : Tampil Menawan dengan memanfaatkan barang-barang yang dianggap tidak berguna, berbagai kreativitas dan desain fashion tampil di sepanjang jalan Malioboro dalam gelaran Jogja Fashion Carnival 2019.Wakil Gubernur DIY, Kanjeng Gusti Pangeran Adipati Aryo (KGPAA) Paku Alam X dalam sambutan pembukaan Jogja Fashion Carnival (JFC) tahun 2019 yang dibacakan Staf Ahli Gubernur Bidang Ekonomi dan Pembangunan, Muji Raharjo menyampaikan, gelaran JFC tahun 2019 yang diselenggarakan sebagai bentuk kekayaan Yogyakarta dari sisi fashion, selain dari segi budaya. "Dengan diselenggarakan ini kita dapat menununjukkan bahwa Yogyakarta tidak hanya kaya akan budaya tetapi kaya akan fashion yang dapat menyatukan unsur seni industri fashion," katanya, Minggu (3/11/2019).Sri Paduka Paku Alam X menyebutkan, penyelenggaraan JFC tahun 2019 sebagai langkah strategis dalam upaya mempromosikan industri fashion DIY maupun fashion di Indonesia, serta perkembangan pariwisata yang ada di Daerah Istimewa Yogyakarta. "Penyelenggaraan ini sangat strategis dalam mempromosikan industri fashion baik di Yogyakarta maupun di indonesia. Dengan tekad berkarya dengan baik Jogja Fashion Carnival memiliki arti penting dalam pengembangan dunia fashion penyelenggaraan bukan hanya dilihat dari sisi kepentingan pelestarian dan pengembangan fashion semata tapi juga pengembangan pariwisata agar lebih baik lebih maju bermanfaat dan berfaedah bagi masyarakat Jogja khususnya," jelasnya.Selain itu, Kepala Dinas Pariwisata DIY Singgih Raharjo mengatakan, Jogja Fashion Carnival diharapkan dapat menguatkan posisi DIY sebagai kota Batik Dunia dengan penyelenggaraan event yang memanfaatkan kain batik sebagai materi serta sebagai wadah desainer untuk mengekspresikan bakat dalam bidang fashion. Mengangkat tema Jantaka Anargya yang memiliki arti merubah atau membuat sesuatu sehingga menghasilkan sesuatu yang bernilai tinggi, Jogja Fashion Carnival tahun 2019 dijelaskannya memiliki dua kategori yaitu flora dan fauna."Ini akan in line sekali dengan tema yang ada di tema Jogja Fashion Week, tema yang ada di Jogja Fashion Week kan Sustainable Fashion, ini sangat related dengan Jogja Fashion Carnival ini flora fauna kita akan kembali ke sustainable juga. Jadi kita mengangkat tema yang menjadi isu global yaitu sustainable itu sendiri, tapi lebih spesifik kita mengambil tema untuk flora dan fauna itu sendiri dan juga tentang recycle supaya mengurangi limbah sehingga itu digunakan kembali," ungkapnya.Sementara Jogja Fashion Carnival yang merupakan bagian dari Jogja Fashion Week ke-14 tahun 2019 yang digelar di sepanjang jalan Malioboro hingga Alun-alun Utara dengan 28 kelompok terdiri dari 5 kelompok bintang tamu dan 22 kelompok yang mengikuti lomba dengan dua kategori tersebut nantinya akan menerima trophy dan uang pembinaan dari Dinas Pariwisata DIY dan akan ditampilkan pada penutupan Jogja Fashion Week di Jogja Expo Center Minggu (3/11/2019) malam mulai pukul 18.30 WIB.
text:
Closing of 2019 Jogja Fashion Carnival
03 Nov 2019, 17:58 by Dyan Parwanto



Closing of 2019 Jogja Fashion Carnival



Closing of 2019 Jogja Fashion Carnival



Closing of 2019 Jogja Fashion Carnival


KBRN, Yogyakarta: Appear Charming by utilizing items deemed useless, various creativity and fashion designs appear along Malioboro street in the Jogja Fashion Carnival event 2019. Deputy Governor of DIY, Kanjeng Gusti Pangeran Adipati Aryo (KGPAA) Paku Alam X in his speech The opening of the Jogja Fashion Carnival (JFC) in 2019 which was read by the Governor's Expert Staff for the Economy and Development, Muji Raharjo said that the JFC event in 2019 was held as a form of Yogyakarta's wealth in terms of fashion, in addition to culture. "By organizing this we can show that Yogyakarta is not only rich in culture but also rich in fashion that can unite the elements of the fashion industry art," he said, Sunday (11/03/2019). Sri Paduka Paku Alam X said, the implementation of JFC in 2019 as strategic steps in efforts to promote the DIY fashion industry and fashion in Indonesia, as well as the development of tourism in the Special Region of Yogyakarta. "This organization is very strategic in promoting the fashion industry both in Yogyakarta and in Indonesia. With the determination to work well Jogja Fashion Carnival has an important meaning in the development of the world of fashion not only in terms of the preservation and development of fashion but also the development of tourism to be better more advanced useful and useful for the people of Jogja in particular, "he explained. In addition, the Head of the Yogyakarta Tourism Office Singgih Raharjo said, Jogja Fashion Carnival is expected to strengthen the position of DIY as the World Batik city by organizing events that utilize batik cloth as material and as a designer container for expressing talent in the field of fashion. Raising the theme of Jantaka Anargya which means changing or making something to produce something of high value, the 2019 Jogja Fashion Carnival explained has two categories, namely flora and fauna. "This will be in line with the theme in the Jogja Fashion Week theme, a theme that At Jogja Fashion Week, it is Sustainable Fashion, this is very related to Jogja Fashion Carnival. Our flora and fauna will return to sustainable too, so we raise the theme of global issues, namely sustainable itself, but more specifically we take themes for flora and fauna. itself and also about recycle in order to reduce waste so that it is reused, "he said. While Jogja Fashion Carnival, which is part of the 14th Jogja Fashion Week in 2019, was held along Malioboro road to North Square with 28 groups consisting of 5 groups guest stars and 22 groups that entered the competition with the two categories were Nantin yes, you will receive a trophy and coaching money from the Yogyakarta Tourism Office and will be displayed at the close of Jogja Fashion Week at the Jogja Expo Center Sunday (11/03/2019) evening starting at 18:30 WIB.
